DJsSecureLunchbox.Name: DJs Scavenged Lunchbox
DJsSecureLunchbox.Description: A small lunchbox scavenged out in the field. Seems to still contain some food, if you can even call it that.

DJsSmallLunchbox.Name: DJs Food Care Package
DJsSmallLunchbox.Description: A small gift found out on the battlefield. Noone seems to know it's origin, but its a boon for those running low on provisions.
